Header.title: Your Trading Solution Partner
Header.paragraph: SAZMIN TRADING is specialized in the sales and service of industrial machineries and spare parts. We have been working with the largest and most significant industrial firms in Bangladesh with our skilled engineers in the automation field (PLC, HMI, VFD, SERVO,IOT,TROUBLESHOOTING etc.).

Contact.address: 198 Bir Uttam Mir Shawkat Sarak, Gulshan Link Road, Tejgaon, 1208 Dhaka, Bangladesh

Features.title: Latest Technology
Features.text: Sazmin Trading will provide one stop solution for your industrial products with the best price, importing products from every corner of the world, working with most reputed brands with complete customer satisfaction

Features.title: Delivery On Time
Features.text: We provide one of the fastest deliveries as we have huge stock of products and we can also provide any industrial product from any part of the world

Features.title: Expert Engineers
Features.text: We have in-house expert engineers who are trained from different programs from different parts of the world, just to give you a complete solution for your industrial products, from supervising to installing and maintaining the installed products.

Features.title: Customer Support
Features.text: Our 24/7 customer service hotline is always available if you need something to query about any product or service we provide.
